title: Atlas Workbench
summary: A multi-page portfolio system with a CMS-like workflow for updates.
highlights: Built a content collection pipeline for projects and blog posts.
Optimized Lighthouse scores with static rendering and image hygiene.
Designed a reusable card system for multiple page templates.

title: Signal Labs
summary: A data-heavy product landing that explains analytics workflows.
highlights: Implemented filterable project cards with lightweight client scripts.
Created a sectioned case study layout to tell the project story.
Built a dark mode experience aligned with the brand palette.
